attributes.action: reduce council tax when social housing is bought into the private sector
attributes.additional_details:
why should hard working people buy and live in the private housing sector for their neighbours to be bought up and then rented out to people on benifits
the landlords are guaranted there over inflated rents to boost there pension pots leaving the rest of us to cope with the everyday mayhem that comes with now living on a council estate losing our true market value for our homes,REBAND THE COUNCIL TAX TO COMPENSATE ALL AFFECTED BY THIS ISSUE.
